testcase.name: Validate Blazedemo flight booking
testcase.system-out: Given user launch Blazedemo site............................................passed Then user enters departure "Philadelphia" and destination city"Rome"........passed Then user clicks on Find Flight.............................................passed Then user clicks Choose This Flight for "234"...............................passed Then user enters details....................................................passed Then user clicks on purchase flight.........................................passed Then validate confirmation id on Confirmation Page..........................passed
